body_html: @jgong5 Personally I think originally putting MKLML stuff under caffe2/mkl was due to historical reason. It's better to live in contrib. As we proceed, we should remove caffe2/mkl and look at caffe2/contrib/ideep only. However, this is not a blocker. If there is confusion, we can always move them around. Just clean up the CMakefile and we can merge this.

As we proceed, we should remove caffe2/mkl and look at caffe2/contrib/ideep only. However, this is not a blocker. If there is confusion, we can always move them around. body: @jgong5 Personally I think originally putting `MKLML` stuff under `caffe2/mkl` was due to historical reason. It's better to live in `contrib`. As we proceed, we should remove `caffe2/mkl` and look at `caffe2/contrib/ideep` only. However, this is not a blocker. If there is confusion, we can always move them around. Just clean up the CMakefile and we can merge this.
